title: I have a code for Dreadknight Garen from twitter
body: I am unable to redeem it, everytime I try I get the same error message: ''There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again'' It says the code expires in august 2018. Pretty please, help? =)

replies.body: Every once and awhile those codes don't work correctly. I've gone ahead and gotten that added to your account for you though ^_^
